metadata.title: CVE-2013-0347 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The Gentoo init script for webfs uses world-readable permissions for/var/log/webfsd.log, which allows local users to have unspecified impact byreading the file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0347` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

webfs - 1.21+ds1-9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webfs package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.21+ds1-9').
